title: Crew Show (Meeting the R34 GT-R; GT3RS; Jetta GLI Review; Rimac; Q&A)
description:
Zack drove an R34 Skyling GT-R V Spec II; the audience of auction platforms; we discuss the confusing Jetta GLI; a very heavy box; and we answer questions about autocross mods, getting back up after a crash, and clothing defecation.

 

Recorded August 17, 2022
